backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, fields, tasks, and authorization logic with CRUD operations and role checks.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend source files covering components, hooks, utilities, and behavior changes.
frontend/docs/deploy-and-localdev-regres: Comprehensive deployment and regression testing checklist for build, login flow, CRUD operations, and smoke tests.
frontend/docs/field-create-failure-repro: Guide documenting reproducible steps and expected behavior for field creation failures.
frontend/docs/profile-save-failure-repro: Detailed analysis of profile save failures, root cause, fixes, and validation steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH variable definitions for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading React bootstrap scripts and root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating identity, actor boot, profile loading, error handling, and rendering of core UI.
frontend/src/bootstrap/bootFallback.ts: Provides a fallback UI that displays sanitized startup errors before React mounts, including console diagnostics and a styled error card with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/bootstrap/preReactGlobals.t: Initializes global shims like process.env and globalThis before React loads, maps Vite env vars, and sets up the boot fallback handler.
frontend/src/components/AllTasksView.tsx: Renders a searchable and sortable list of tasks, fetching tasks and fields, and providing UI controls for filtering and sorting.
frontend/src/components/CreateFieldDialo: Dialog for creating a new field with authentication checks, backend initialization gating, and form submission via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Dialog for creating a task with scale inputs, duration settings, dependency selection, and submission through a task creation mutation.
Dialog for editing a field’s name, icon, and color, with state reset on open and update submission through a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing a task, handling fields like name, scores, duration conversion, dependencies, and field reassignment.
frontend/src/components/FieldCard.tsx: Displays a field summary card with icon, task count, and averaged metrics.
Detail view for a field with task list, filtering, sorting, field metrics, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing credits and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with theme toggle, app title, and authenticated user menu with logout.
frontend/src/components/ImportDataConfir: Confirmation dialog warning users before overwriting all fields and tasks during import.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login screen highlighting app features and enabling Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter a name and save their profile after authentication.
frontend/src/components/RecoverableBootE: Displays a recoverable boot error with retry, logout, copy-to-clipboard, and expandable diagnostic details.
frontend/src/components/SortDirectionTog: A button that toggles sort direction and shows a tooltip describing the current mode.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Renders a task card with completion, undo, edit, delete actions, dependency display, and attribute badges.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout, and identity persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, fields, and tasks with detailed error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Initializes a backend actor with retry logic and invalidates queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard UI with field/task views, search, sorting, authentication checks, and data import/export handling.
frontend/src/utils/bootErrorMessages.ts: Provides utilities to extract readable text from IC errors and detect specific cases like missing profiles or stopped canisters.
frontend/src/utils/downloadJson.ts: Exports objects as JSON files with BigInt handling and safe download logic.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Contains helpers for converting duration units and formatting minute-based durations into readable strings.
Normalizes export-data errors into categorized, user‑friendly messages for login, actor, network, and backend issues.
frontend/src/utils/fieldAppearance.ts: Defines preset icons and colors for fields and helpers to resolve icon components and color values.
frontend/src/utils/fieldCreationErrors.t: Normalizes field‑creation errors into clear categories, including login, actor readiness, authorization, and profile issues.
frontend/src/utils/parseExportPayload.ts: Validates and converts exported JSON into typed ExportPayload objects, restoring BigInts, Principals, and defaulting missing field appearance values.
frontend/src/utils/profileSaveErrors.ts: Normalizes profile save errors into categorized, user-friendly messages using message patterns and safe extraction.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, features, and state for a task management app using ICP, React, and Motoko.
